actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: Resolution providing for the termination of assistance to Turkey and Greece.

summary.text: Terminates all assistance, under the Foreign Assistance Act, to Greece and Turkey until they abide by the Security Council resolution on Cyprus. Expresses the sense of Congress that the current situation in Cyprus warrants an immediate total cessation of United States assistance until the conditions specified in this resolution are achieved.

titles.title: Resolution providing for the termination of assistance to Turkey and Greece.
